name: Developer's Console
author: LazyWizard
description:
An in-game developer's console, only functional in campaign mode.
By default the console is activated with tilde (~). The console can be re-bound by pressing Shift+F1 on the campaign map.

Compatible with all mods that take place in the Corvus system, as well as Project CAELUS, Project Ironclads, Fight for Universe: Sector Xplo, and Ascendency.
